entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
